2.title: Tutu Badou/Hidden Courtyard

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Badou discovers his love of dance but gets cold feet before a Palace recital when he thinks his friends will make fun of him.

3.title: Memory Mayhem/Soaped!

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Badou is determined to win the prize for "Funniest Memory" at Babar's Memory Party. When he discovers Crocodylus is passing off one of Gallop's memories as his own, Badou risks the contest in order to get slow-moving Gallop to the Palace in time to expose the cheating Ambassador.

4.title: The Thunderclap/The Celesteville Junior Marching Band

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: To keep a Badou on-task to learn the Elephant's emergency trumpet signal - The Thunderclap - Pom takes Badou on a camping trip away from all distractions. When Sleek the Leopard comes prowling around, Badou must perfect the trumpet in a hurry to save his father.

5.title: Windrunners/Bivowacky

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Badou plans a relaxing balloon flight for his overworked grandfather but forgets to anchor the tether line. The two are swept away by the wind to crash in Sleek's part of the Jungle. Working together, Badou and Babar turn the broken balloon into a raft and sail home, causing Babar to remark about their grand adventure. Then, the monsoon rains have the kids going stir crazy until Badou takes them on an "imagination safari" through the Palace. The Crocs try to ruin things but Badou cleverly works their mischief into part of the game ensuring everyone has even more fun.

6.title: Copy Cat/Heropotamus

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Determined to stand out from the herd, Zawadi goes to Dandy Andi for pointers on how to be unique. Instead, she ends up trying to act like a cool Lion and attracts the attentions of Sleek. Badou, Munroe, and Andi rush to her aid but it is Zawadi - acting like her own unique self - who saves the day.

7.title: Lulu Time/Chocolate Banana Soup

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Badou is dreading a visit from his energetic young cousin Lulu. After all, little cousins are the bane of existence for 8 year old adventurers. But when he thinks Lulu has gone missing in the Jungle, Badou pulls out all the stops to find her and bring her home safe.

8.title: The Quillinator/Truffle Snuffle

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Munroe overhears what he thinks is a Rhino plot against Badou and appoints himself the Prince's bodyguard. Unfortunately, his increasingly outlandish security measures drive Badou crazy, eventually leading to complete comic mayhem as Munroe sets traps all over the Palace.

9.title: The Kite Fight/Zoomerblimps

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Chiku volunteers Munroe for a kite flying contest against the Crocs. She promises to build him the best kite ever but keeps getting distracted by newer, better design ideas. Badou tries to help her focus so she can deliver on a promise made to a friend.

10.title: Gone Wild/Operation: Secret Suitcase

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Dandy Andi, the Lion, teaches Badou and Chiku how to survive on the Savanna. When Andi falls into an old pit trap, the kids must use their new skills to help rescue their friend.

11.title: Jake and the Big Book/Blacktrunk's Magic Stone

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Jake is determined to find a way to get mentioned in Babar's Memory Book. When all his crazy plans - like saving the King's life, inventing something great, and discovering a lost city - end up failing, Badou saves the little Fox from disappointment by showing him how Jake is mentioned dozens of times over in the Book - just for being Jake.

12.title: The Key/Grotto for One

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Badou finds an old treasure chest with a busted key and heads to the Bazaar to get the key fixed. Babar warns him not to take the key out of his pocket but Badou can't resist showing it to Chiku and Munroe. The greedy Ambassador Crocodylus snatches the key from him setting off a madcap chase to recover it.

13.title: Monkey Camp/Bad Bounce

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Chiku invites Badou to come with her to Monkey Camp. There, the eager Prince quickly learns that Monkey games like swinging and climbing and banana-boarding are tough for Elephants. He's determined not to disappoint his best friend even if it means scaling the high, high Camping Tree.

14.title: The Brave Guy/Starring Ms Strich

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: A spooky story told by Celeste has Munroe struggling to get a grip on a new feeling: fear. Trying to prove to himself that he is still brave, Munroe dashes about causing comic disasters. Badou and the other kids to help Munroe confront his fears only to discover Celeste's story may be true after all!

15.title: Bob/Villains

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Everyone's favorite old tree - Bob - is damaged in a storm and slated to get cut down. Badou and his friends try to rush back to the Palace to get an order to stop the chop but are delayed at every turn by others in need of help after the storm.

16.title: Flower Power/Hee Honk

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: After accidentally damaging Babar's garden, Badou asks Zawadi to help him find a rare Jungle flower for his Papi. Badou initially finds flowers kind of boring but when he and Zawadi fall afoul of Sleek, Badou must use the natural defenses of various plants to help them escape.

17.title: Ruby Rumpus/Dandy Andi

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Lady Rataxes's famed RhinoceRuby is stolen while she is visiting the Palace. Badou and Rhudi are each determined to find it first but their competitive natures keep allowing the real thief to escape detection. It is only when they merge their investigative skills that they are able to recover the gem.

18.title: Birdie Bonk/Badou on the Ball

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: The student becomes the teacher when Badou teams up with the inexperienced Ms. Strich in order to defeat the cheating Crocs in the annual Birdie Bonk Championship.

19.title: Neighborly Nice Day/Savanna Scramble

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Badou worries when Babar must recreate a fateful balloon flight through Windsong Canyon. With Chiku's help, Badou comes up with a plan to help his Papi get past the most treacherous part of the thrilling journey.

20.title: Toy Trouble/The Royal Portrait

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Badou is fooled into giving Rhudi a super cool toy that Chiku has made. The little Prince must do all he can to win the toy back before Rhudi leaves the Palace with it.

21.title: Coconut Jinx/Adventurephant

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: Someone is stealing all the coconuts in the Jungle. Badou, Munroe, and Jake help Cornelius investigate but, when the elderly Elephant is also snatched, the boys must overcome their fear and track down the high-flying culprit.

22.title: The Dino Egg/Stone Stealer

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: While hunting for fossils, Tersh discovers an unusual egg. A glib remark from Badou convinces Tersh that it must be a dinosaur egg. Hearing of this rare prize, Crocodylus steals the egg for himself. Badou and Tersh have to work together to get the egg back before the baby bird inside hatches.

23.title: Sneaking Past/Crash N' Dash

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Badou needs a pair of his dad's old wheelie-sneaks to win a race. He searches everywhere for them and ends up discovering all kinds of wonderful things he didn't know about his father.

24.title: The Day of the Jake/Point Guard

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: Badou and Chiku help Jake pick the perfect day for his birthday by trying to discover when the little orphan first arrived in Celesteville. Their adventures take them from the Palace to the Bazaar to the Lioness lair on the Savanna, making Jake realize today is the perfect day.

25.title: Dimday Pirates/No Foolin'

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: While playing pirates, Badou, Chiku, and Munroe discover a water weed that can be woven into colorful fabric. They harvest all they can only to be told by Babar that the local birds need the weed to build nests. The kids discover Dilash has taken the harvest setting off a chase to return the weed to the birds.

26.title: Moon and Star and Sun/The Gold Mines of Gaxx

episode of.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: Badou, Chiku and the ever-competitive Rhudi piece together three artifacts that reveal the location of the legendary Gold Mines of Gaxx. But when Prospero gets the jump on them, the kids have to come up with a plan to keep the bush pirate from plundering the site.

imdb.title: Babar and the Adventures of Badou

production companies.name: Bell Broadcast and New Media Fund

plot: An updated version of the classic series, following Badou, and King Babar's 8-year-old grandson.
